attributes.action: bring in a law to prosecute parents who lie about the other parent of their child/ren during custody battles.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Parents who lie about the other parent of their child/ren during custody battles are perverting the course of justice. This petition is to show that we, as the people of this country, want those people to be prosecuted, just as they would if they lied in a criminal trial.
